item.title: ‘Nysa in India’ & the
item.description: Source: here. ‘Nysa in India’ & the Related Narratives … Dionysiac claims Notwithstanding the nativity of these traditions, the art of the region was still claimed by some to be related to the Greek traditions of Dionysus. The predominant art of the region of not just these tribes but also including the entire Swat valley (the earlier territory of Kamboja and Gandhara) also has been called ‘Dionysiac’ for their prolific use of wine and ‘Bacchalic scenes.
